title: Famiresu Senshi Purin (Sex Warrior Pudding)
synopsis: By a sudden order from this father, Shuta happened to work as the manager of the family restaurant, A la mode. There Nishino Purin, whom he had adored, was also working. Though he spent dreamlike days in which he was served sexual treatment by the cute clerks, it didn't last long. He knew another face of the A la mode, it was an organization to protect the Earth.
